refnamediv.refpurpose: Reads a local or distant image file and returns the image in a Scilab object

listitem.para: A string containing the relative/complete path handled are png, bmp, gif and jpg besides images encoded in CMYK and animated gif. Alphan channel is handled for MIME types png and gif.
An object of type jimage (mlist) with 5 fields : .image, .encoding, .title, .mime and .transparencyColor.

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: This function loads in a Scilab object an image and some metadata from a local or a distant file referenced by its path or an URL.

listitem.para: the intensity of each pixel encoded in positive 8-bits intergers in the field .image,
the encoding type ('gray', 'rgb', ou 'rgba') in the field .encoding,
the image title in the field .title,
the MIME type of the image in the field .mime.
the transparency color in the field .transparencyColor.
listitem.warning: Transparency color is lost during the import in a Scilab object. The default value of jimage.transparencyColor is -1.
